title: Kanha National Park
brief_description: Kanha National Park in the hills of Madhya Pradesh. The park is noted for its rare Indian swamp deer, together with spotted deer, black buck antelope, tigers, langur, and Indian bison.
description: Kanha National Park in the hills of Madhya Pradesh. The park is noted for its rare Indian swamp deer, together with spotted deer, black buck antelope, tigers, langur, and Indian bison.
